text: José María Junior Moreno Huaca (born 19 January 1997 in Riohacha) is a Colombian professional footballer who currently plays for Fortaleza C.E.I.F. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian footballers Category:Colombian expatriate footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Cimarrones de Sonora players Category:Fortaleza C.E.I.F. footballers Category:Ascenso MX players Category:Categoría Primera B players Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Mexico Category:Expatriate footballers in Mexico Category:People from La Guajira Department
title: Junior Moreno
